WORST WORLD IS A ZOMBIE MULTIPLAYER SURVIVAL GAME. SURVIVE IN AN APOCALYPTIC ZOMBIE WORLD WHERE NATURE GIVES YOU NO GIFTS. THE GAME WILL COME AS CLOSE AS POSSIBLE TO REALITY AND WILL REQUIRE YOU TO INVOKE TO SURVIVE AGAINST THE ZOMBIE BUT ESPECIALLY AGAINST THE OTHER SURVIVOR. MAKE FRIENDS OR JOIN A COMMUNITY TO HELP YOU
